description: Situated right in the heart of the historic centre among the narrow alleyways near the market and Piazza Maggiore, this restaurant serves traditional cuisine (no fish) with a subtle contemporary twist. Two modern dining rooms with modern decor, plus a wine list with a focus on regional labels.
